name: Mad Ⓥ-Apes Elementals
desc: Mad Ⓥ-Apes Elementals is the 3rd MVA NFT collection comprised of 9,999 female apes coming to VeChain to become the queens of the Ve-Jungle! Elementals are an essential part of the MVA ecosystem alongside the other 2 MVA collections. The ALPHA Series dropped on Dec. 2nd & the 3D FUSION Series apes released on Feb. 5th. Welcome to the MVA World!
